attributes.action: Register a max of 2 motor vehicles per household for off road parking. any addition vehicles to pay an additional sum on their road tax to allow them to park outside of their property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To encourage housholders to park on their property rather than on thr street. For every household a maximum of two motor vehicles can be registered to park on their property ie off road, (car tax as normal) if found to be parked on the road at there home address for more vthan 2 hrs at any on time then an on the spot fine can be imposed on this vehicle. Any additional vehicles ergered this the same address will be subject to a supliment payment on their road tax and this will allow the said vehicle to be entitled to park on the street ouitside  the said propert without penalty.
